title: Verify Subscribe Button Functionality
description: Ensure the Subscribe button triggers the newsletter subscription modal.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Subscribe' button.
expected_result: A newsletter subscription modal should appear, allowing the user to enter their email.

title: Verify Discord Button Functionality
description: Ensure the Discord button triggers the Discord community modal.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Discord' button.
expected_result: A Discord community modal should appear with information on joining the Discord community.

title: Verify Archive Button Functionality
description: Ensure the Archive button redirects to the archive page.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Archive' button.
expected_result: The user should be redirected to the archive page displaying past articles.

title: Verify GitHub Button Functionality
description: Ensure the GitHub button redirects to the correct GitHub repository.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the GitHub icon button.
expected_result: The user should be redirected to the AI Frontiers Digest GitHub repository.

title: Verify Light/Dark Mode Toggle
description: Ensure the Light/Dark mode toggle changes the theme of the webpage.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Light' button to toggle the theme.
expected_result: The webpage theme should switch between light and dark modes.

title: Verify Search Functionality
description: Ensure the search bar allows users to search for articles.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Enter a search term in the 'Search articles...' field. 3. Press Enter.
expected_result: The page should display articles related to the search term.

title: Verify Newsletter Subscription with Valid Email
description: Ensure users can subscribe to the newsletter using a valid email address.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Subscribe' button. 3. Enter a valid email address. 4. Click 'Subscribe Now'.
expected_result: A confirmation message should appear, indicating successful subscription.

title: Verify Newsletter Subscription with Invalid Email
description: Ensure users cannot subscribe to the newsletter using an invalid email address.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Subscribe' button. 3. Enter an invalid email address. 4. Click 'Subscribe Now'.
expected_result: An error message should appear, indicating the email address is invalid.

title: Verify Audio Playback Functionality
description: Ensure the audio button plays the article summary audio.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'Audio' button next to an article.
expected_result: The article summary audio should play, and the playback controls should be visible.

title: Verify NotebookLM Audio Playback Functionality
description: Ensure the NotebookLM button plays the associated audio.
steps: 1. Navigate to the webpage. 2. Click on the 'NotebookLM' button next to an article.
expected_result: The NotebookLM audio should play, and the playback controls should be visible.
